fr.lirmm.graphik.graal.rulesetanalyser.graph

Class AffectedPositionSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.lirmm.graphik.graal.rulesetanalyser.graph.AffectedPositionSet

  • public class AffectedPositionSet
extends Object
    A position p[i] is affected if there exists an existential variable occurring in position p[i] or if there is a frontier variable on position p[i] in the head of a rule occurring in an affected position in its body. A variable from a rule body is said to be affected if it occurs in some affected position. The affected position set of a rule set R is the set of all affected positions in R.
    Author:
    Cl√©ment Sipieter (INRIA) <clement@6pi.fr>, Swan Rocher

      Iterable<Rule> getRules() 
      protected void init() 
      boolean isAffected(Predicate predicate, int position) 
      boolean isAffected(PredicatePosition pp) 
      protected void step1()
      for each rule and for each existentially quantified variable occuring at position p[i] in its head, p[i] is affected;
      protected void step2()
      for each rule and for each variable x that occurs at some affected positions in its body, all positions q[j] in its head where occurs x are affected.
